web.q3: How to request changes to a case?
web.q4: How to request a new treatment plan for an already treated patient?
web.a1: Access the private platform / register if you have not done so yet / create a planning / complete your patient information, treatment goals and upload the records / pay for the chosen planning on our payment gateway. Once all the steps have been completed, we will upload your patient's planning to the website in a few days.
web.a2: Access the private platform / access your patient area / click “approve” / receive the biomodels in your email.
web.a3: Access the private platform / access your patient area / click on “new records and written instructions” / complete the new goals and/or upload the new records / send.
web.a4: Access the private platform / access your patient's area / click on “new planning” / complete the new treatment goals and upload the records / pay for the chosen planning on our payment gateway. Once all the steps have been completed, we will upload your patient's planning to the website in a few days.

records.q1: Can I send you physical models?
records.q2: My records are distorted, can I send them to you?
records.q3: Are you compatible with any brand of scanner?
records.q4: Can I send only the digital records of the upper and lower arch to carry out the treatment?
records.a1: No, we only work with digital models. If you do not have an intraoral scanner, you can ask your trusted laboratory to digitize the models so you can send them to us.
records.a2: We recommend that you send us quality records, however, if the distortion is not relevant we will try to detail them virtually. If our team determines that these records are not valid, you will be notified so that you can upload new records to the website.
records.a3: Yes, we are compatible with all intraoral scanners.
records.a4: Yes, however, we recommend that you send us all the possible files to be able to refine the planning as much as possible.

planningHome.q1: How long does it take you to make a plan?
planningHome.q2: What is a plan made up of?
planningHome.q3: What patient’s records have to be sent?
planningHome.q4: Can I request some modifications to the proposed treatment plan?
planningHome.q5: What software do you plan with?
planningHome.q6: My patient is following the treatment plan and I am not sure when to do IPR, change or removal of attachments, elastics, aesthetic pontics..
planningHome.q7: I approved the case, I log in and find 3 written reports and 3 simulations in my patient's area, I do not remember which one is valid.
planningHome.q8: I have a case of plastic orthodontics but I do not know if it is valid due to its complexity, can you evaluate it?
planningHome.q9: I am new to plastic orthodontics, can you recommend me a proposed treatment plan for my patients?
planningHome.a1: The period time is 11 days. Keep in mind that the planning process starting with taking records is a very detailed process with many stages.
planningHome.a2: A well-detailed written report with all its applications and characteristics of the case, a 3D simulation with all its information and measurement tools and the entire sequence of biomodels of the case once you approve it. You can find all these elements in your patient's area.
planningHome.a3: Our recommendation is that you send the files of the upper and lower arch, intraoral and extraoral images and RX.
planningHome.a4: Absolutely, remember that you take decisions, we help you along the process, but you always have the last word.
planningHome.a5: NemoCast software from the company Nemotec.
planningHome.a6: Any initial, final or intermediate application or action of your patient's treatment will always be reflected in the written report that we upload to the WEB.
planningHome.a7: The most up-to-date report and simulation are the valid ones.
planningHome.a8: Of course, the process to follow is the same as if you create and submit a new case. If it is not possible to apply plastic orthodontics, you will be notified and the planning price will be refunded.
planningHome.a9: Absolutely. You will be advised and a proposed treatment plan will be developed.

planiLinkSupport.q1: How can I reach out to
planiLinkSupport.a1: At the moment, you can contact Planilink via email or via WEB Chat. In case of an urgent matter, one of our colleagues will contact you by telephone to the phone number provided. In either case, we will get back to you as soon as possible for the next 5 days. planilink@planilink.com

payment.q1: When do I make the planning payment?
payment.q2: How do I make the payment?
payment.q3: I have paid for a planning of more than 15 aligners and the final treatment plan is less than 15 aligners.
payment.q4: I have paid for a plan of up to 15 aligners and the final treatment plan is more than 15 aligners.
payment.q5: I have paid for a plan of up to 5 aligners and the final treatment plan is more than 5 aligners.
payment.a1: At the end of the prescription creation process and before submitting the case for planning.
payment.a3: We will refund you the price difference.
payment.a4: We will ask you to pay the price difference through a payment gateway.
payment.a5: We will ask you to pay the price difference through a payment gateway.
payment.a6: We value each of our clients individually.

biomodels.q1: When do I receive the biomodels?
biomodels.q2: Where do I receive my biomodels?
biomodels.q3: Can the biomodels be sent directly to my trusted laboratory?
biomodels.q4: Do the biomodels come perfectly prepared for 3D printing?
biomodels.q5: What If I want my biomodels to come with different cutting, filling, or labeling from the standard?
biomodels.q6: Will I find the attachment templates in the sequence of biomodels sent?
biomodels.a1: Once you approve the treatment plan on the WEB, the biomodels will be sent.
biomodels.a2: The biomodels will be sent to the email used for the registration process. If you have another preference let us know. Remember that we will send you the biomodels by email through WeTransfer platform.
biomodels.a3: Yes, just tell us its email and we will send it so that your aligners can be manufactured.
biomodels.a4: Indeed, we leave them perfectly cut and labeled so you do not have to worry about anything.
biomodels.a5: No problem at all as long as our planning software allows it.
biomodels.a6: Yes, as long as there are attachments in the proposed treatment. The starting templates of attachments are numbers 0. If there are templates attachments in an intermediate step, it will be reflected in the biomodels sequence.

alignerMaterial.q1: What material do I use to thermoform the aligners?
alignerMaterial.q2: How long do I heat the thermoforming plates?
alignerMaterial.q3: There are different thicknesses of aligner plates, which one do I use?
alignerMaterial.q4: Do I cut the aligners straight or draw the neck shape?
alignerMaterial.q5: How much vertical dimension do I leave the aligner when trimming it?
alignerMaterial.a1: We recommend that you buy good quality, high-performance materials. Keep in mind that the aligner material is what is responsible for moving your patient's teeth, among other things.
alignerMaterial.a2: The material manufacturer will tell you what the appropriate heating and subsequent cooling program is. Check the manual that comes with the irons.
alignerMaterial.a3: Thickness of 0.5 mm is for placing attachments. 0.75mm thickness is for all types of treatments. 0.8mm thickness is for treatments with elastics, large expansions or with many cuts in the aligner. 1mm thickness is for final retention.
alignerMaterial.a4: We recommend a straight cut, drawing the shape of the neck takes significant extra work. Additionally, it weakens the aligner.
alignerMaterial.a5: The aligner, except in exceptional cases, always covers the entire surface of the teeth. Covering the vertical dimension of the teeth is enough.

alignerManufacturer.q1: Is making aligners as simple as you show on the Planilink website?
alignerManufacturer.q2: Should I buy a printer with a large, medium or small 3D printing volume?
alignerManufacturer.q3: Should I buy the best 3D printer on the market?
alignerManufacturer.q5: What material do I use to 3D print?
alignerManufacturer.q6: How many microns do I print the biomodels at?
alignerManufacturer.q7: What material do I use to clean the biomodels after printing?
alignerManufacturer.q8: Do models need to be further cured or light-cured after 3D printing?
alignerManufacturer.q9: How many aligners do I give my patient?
alignerManufacturer.q10: I am having many cases of plastic orthodontics and I need to scale my printing area and/or my business and I don't really know how to do it, can you help me?
alignerManufacturer.q12: Do I need a very large area to make my aligners?
alignerManufacturer.a1: Yes, follow the steps and with the machines that we indicate and you will have your own aligners. Remember that as in all aspects, there is a learning curve. I encourage you, it is very simple!
alignerManufacturer.a2: Buy it in a medium size, in which you can print at least 6 models at a time.
alignerManufacturer.a3: There are low profile printers that provide excellent features and performance. Also, remember, it is very important to carefully review the price of the 3D printing material before purchasing the printer.
alignerManufacturer.a4: The maintenance required for a desktop 3D printer is minimal. An easy way to check if it prints well is by reviewing the printed biomodels.
alignerManufacturer.a6: At 100 microns you will obtain a very detailed result with a low construction time. We recommend you maintain that standard.
alignerManufacturer.a7: Use isopropyl alcohol only. Immerse the models, shake them a little in the alcohol and let them rest for 10 min. Remove them and let them air dry. Remember to change the alcohol when it starts to look cloudy.
alignerManufacturer.a8: No, the models can be perfectly thermoformed once cleaned, dried and removed from the printer. Save yourself that step.
alignerManufacturer.a9: We recommend supplying sets of 3 or 4 stages. Remember that the aligners are changed every 11 to 15 days. You have a large margin of time to be able to manufacture the following stages.
alignerManufacturer.a10: Yes, as long as our conditions are followed.
alignerManufacturer.a11: only plans your plastic orthodontic cases online.
alignerManufacturer.a12: No, a small, ventilated area will suffice.

home.biomechanical guarantees: We are aware that planning plastic orthodontics with biomechanical guarantees is a complex job which requires time of study and development of each planning by well-specialized professionals.
home.We do the planning for: We do the planning for you because we love it and we have the know-how.
home.plans your plastic: plans your plastic orthodontic cases and sends you the sequence of biomodels so that you can make your own aligners on your own.
home.It is as simple: It is as simple as that.
home.Send the stls, files and case goals: Send the stls, files and case goals
home.Approve the case and receive the biomode: Approve the case and receive the biomodels
home.Choose the planning that suits your pati: Choose the planning that suits your patient best
home.We boost you: We boost you to the next horizon on the invisible level
home.We first plan: We first plan your plastic orthodontic cases and then biomodels are sent. After that, you are the only one who decides what happens next.
home.Working together with: Working together with main brands makes you depend on their rates, terms and conditions. Be the one who decides your own strategy and margins of profit in an individual or an overall context.
home.In a market led: In a market led by the main brands, the possibility of delivering your own aligners on your own establishes you as an authority in your area and offers you a wide range of new opportunities.
home.With biomodels in: With biomodels in your hand, start the treatment and/or replace lost or broken aligners on the same day.
home.We have several aces up our sleeves: We have several aces up our sleeves
home.is a complete plastic: is a complete plastic orthodontic planning center.
home.Planning in an experienced: Planning in an experienced and in full compliance with all scientifically based biomechanical protocols is our road map.
home.Whatever your patient: Whatever your patient's malocclusion may be, our orthodontists will shape the treatment plan from record taking to final retention.
home.Each of our plans: Each of our plans must respect compliance rules before being sent to you as a valid treatment plan proposal.
home.Training courses and regular: Training courses and regular assessments taken by our orthodontists reflect the accuracy of diagnosis and development of each of our planning.

homeCard.A quality planning: A quality planning is the key to success of

privacy.Your privacy is very important: Your privacy is very important to Nebula Nexus LLC. This Privacy Statement describes how we collect, protect, use and share your Personal Information (that is, information about an identified or identifiable natural person).
privacy.By using our Sites: By using our Sites, you consent to our collection, use, disclosure, transfer and processing of Personal Information in accordance with this Privacy Statement.
privacy.We collect Personal Information: We collect Personal Information from clients, patients, doctors and website visitors when you register to become a member of our Sites or through online forms or by downloading and using the application, such as when you register to receive news alerts from us or to undergo a smile evaluation. Such information may include your name, address, telephone number, email address, IP address or other common identifying information, such as location, date of birth or age, gender, income information, credit card information and other related financial information. with payment for services, dental records, biological characteristics, medical information, photographs and other information you choose to provide. Additionally, when you visit our Sites, we may collect sensitive data about you, such as health information related to your teeth, including images of your teeth.
privacy.When collecting health data: When collecting health data on our Sites, we ask for your explicit consent to collect the sensitive data and your acceptance of the terms of this Privacy Statement.
privacy.We will also collect: We will also collect information about you and your use of our Sites as described in the Cookies and Ads section below.
privacy.Sometimes you may choose: Sometimes you may choose to provide us with Personal Information about other people so that, for example, we can contact them with information about us. You should only share their Personal Information with us if you have obtained their consent and permission to do so.
privacy.What do we do with the information we co: What do we do with the information we collect?
privacy.We use your Personal Information: • We use your Personal Information for a variety of business purposes, including:
privacy.Set up and manage your: • Set up and manage your user account on our Sites
privacy.Provide you with information: • Provide you with information about our products, services, news and events that we think may interest you.
privacy.Provide you with details of doctors: • Provide you with details of doctors and their consultations and send them contact requests.
privacy.Invite you to participate: • Invite you to participate in our surveys or become a member of a fan club (if applicable).
privacy.Collect demographic information: • Collect demographic information about user trends, such as age, gender, and general income levels.Proporcionar información a doctores certificados con información sobre pacientes o posibles pacientes.
privacy.Analyze the use of our services: • Analyze the use of our services, develop new services and products and personalize the products, services or other types of information that we make available to you.
privacy.Use content uploaded to the: • Use content uploaded to the application to share through social networks and make copies of your content to advertise on the Internet, on TV, in publications or in any other media. We will never show your name in any promotional material we generate without your explicit consent, but you should be aware that there may be people who recognize your photograph.Utilizamos una sólida combinación de fuentes de datos (online, pedidos, clientes, etc.) para tener una visión completa de nuestros esfuerzos de marketing y de nuestros productos. Estos datos son solo para nosotros y no compartimos su información personal con otras empresas que la utilicen para otros fines que no estén relacionados con su trabajo con nosotros.
privacy.Who do we share your Personal Informatio: Who do we share your Personal Information with?
privacy.We partner with other companies: We partner with other companies to assist us in our marketing, communications and sales efforts, and we may share your Personal Information with them for these purposes where you have given us consent to do so or where you otherwise allow us to do so. the law.
privacy.Additionally, all information: Additionally, all information we collect, including Personal Information, may be disclosed as part of an actual or potential purchase, reorganization, merger, acquisition, debt financing, sale of company assets or similar transactions, as well as in the event of insolvency, bankruptcy or receivership, in which case personal information may be transferred to third parties as one of our business assets.
privacy.We may also disclose Personal: We may also disclose Personal Information: if we believe that such disclosure is required by law, court order or legal process; under the discovery process in a lawsuit; to enforce our legal rights, policies or contracts; to collect amounts owed to Nebula Nexus LLC when we believe disclosure is necessary or appropriate to prevent physical harm or financial loss or in connection with an investigation or prosecution of suspected or actual illegal activity; or if we in good faith believe that disclosure is in any way necessary or advisable.
privacy.Al igual que muchos sitios web: Al igual que muchos sitios web, nuestros Sitios usan cookies. Además, utilizamos publicidad basada en intereses para ofrecerle anuncios que se adapten a los suyos. Consulte la sección Cookies y anuncios para obtener más información.
privacy.Do Not Track (DNT) is a privacy: Do Not Track (DNT) is a privacy preference that users can set in certain web browsers. DNT is a way for users to tell websites and services that they do not want certain information collected about their visits to web pages over time and across websites or online services. Nebula Nexus LLC does not recognize or respond to browser-initiated DNT signals.
privacy.Our Sites may contain link: Our Sites may contain links to other sites simply for convenience. Nebula Nexus LLC is not responsible for the privacy practices or content of other websites. The inclusion of links does not signify our endorsement of the information or the company. This means that if you link to other sites through ours, we are not responsible and it is beyond our control what they do with your information.
privacy.Additionally, you have the opportunity: Additionally, you have the opportunity to share your information with other websites, for example on social networks. We may provide you with a convenient link so you can easily do this, but we are not responsible for and cannot control such websites or the messages or information you share. We encourage you to review the privacy policies and information collection practices of other websites and social media sites.
privacy.Where you have given us: Where you have given us your consent (where necessary), we may sometimes send you information about ourselves.
privacy.Nebula Nexus LLC offers: Nebula Nexus LLC offers you the opportunity to request to unsubscribe from receiving electronic communications from Nebula Nexus LLC or our partners by withdrawing your consent. If you do not want to receive communications from us, please inform us when collecting your information or write to us at remove@planilink.com and be sure to mention which country you are in. You can also use the unsubscribe method included in our emails. Please allow us sufficient time to process your request.
privacy.You should note that such: You should note that such withdrawal of consent does not apply to communications that are necessary, such as a response to a question you asked, and will no longer have effect if you later request any information from us, for example, if Sign up to receive news alerts.
privacy.Nebula Nexus LLC operates: Nebula Nexus LLC operates globally and therefore we may make transfers of your Personal Information to other countries where Nebula Nexus LLC operates, including countries other than your country of residence. Your Personal Information may also be stored on our servers located outside of your country of residence. However, we will continue to protect your information in accordance with this Privacy Statement and our Binding Corporate Rules (BCR). By providing us with your Personal Information, you consent to such transfers, processing and/or storage anywhere in the world, including the United States.
privacy.The security of all: The security of all Personal Information provided to Nebula Nexus LLC is important to us, and Nebula Nexus LLC is committed to taking reasonable measures designed to protect your Personal Information. Our Sites incorporate security measures to attempt to protect you from the destruction, loss, misuse and unauthorized alteration, disclosure or access of data under our control. Our web portals transmit information (including Personal Information) about the patient securely through the HTTPS protocol. These portals require customer accounts and are not available to the general public. Unfortunately, no data transmission over the Internet or storage of information can be guaranteed 100% secure. Therefore, while Nebula Nexus LLC strives to protect your Personal Information, we cannot ensure or warrant the security of any information you transmit to Nebula Nexus LLC and do so at your own risk.
privacy.This statement may be updated: This statement may be updated periodically as we deem necessary in our sole discretion. When we do so, we will indicate the last updated date at the beginning of the statement. Notice of such update and/or modification will be provided on our Sites or directly to you, if required by law. We encourage you to review this statement periodically so that you can stay informed about how we collect, use and share Personal Information. Your continued relationship with Nebula Nexus LLC following the posting or notification of any revised Privacy Statement will constitute your agreement to be bound by such changes. Any changes to this Privacy Statement will be effective immediately upon being posted or otherwise provided by Nebula Nexus LLC.
privacy.If you have any questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Statement, the privacy practices of our Sites, your information or your rights regarding your information, or your activity with our Sites, please contact:
privacy.8206 Louisiana Blvd: 8206 Louisiana Blvd NE Ste B, #10080, Albuquerque, NM 87113
privacy.Visiting this website: Visiting this website does not mean that the interested party is obliged to provide their personal data.
privacy.In the event: In the event that the interested party provides personal data (“Data”), the data will be treated in a fair and lawful manner, respecting at all times the principles and rights set out in Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the Parliament and the Council of April 27, 2016 regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the free circulation of these data (“GDPR”) and other applicable national regulations.
privacy.What do we do with your data?: What do we do with your data?
privacy.The main purpose: The main purpose of the processing is the management of registered users on our website. Legitimation: Art. 6.1.a) RGPD: express consent. The data will be kept until the user deletes their personal account.
privacy.When the user: When the user has not previously made a purchase on Planilink, they will only be sent advertising related to their own products and services when they give express consent for this purpose. The legitimizing basis is express consent in accordance with Art. 6.1.a) RPGD. The data will be kept until the user expresses their opposition to the processing through a simple and accessible unsubscription procedure in each advertising communication.
privacy.People who have purchased: People who have purchased products sold by Planilink may receive commercial communications based on Art. 21.2 Law 34/2002, of July 11, on information society services and electronic commerce. The interested person will be able to process the unsubscription in a simple way through the link available in each communication.
privacy.The data will be processed: The data will be processed to process a request for information. The legitimizing basis of the treatment is Art. 6.1.a) RPGD, the express consent of the interested party. The data will be kept only for the period necessary to process the query.
privacy.We have appointed: We have appointed a data protection officer (DPO) for any matter relating to your personal data. You can contact him at lopd@planilink.com
privacy.Users must guarantee: Users must guarantee the veracity, accuracy, authenticity and validity of the personal data collected from them.
privacy.We do not collect: We do not collect personal data from minors. It is the responsibility of the parent/legal guardian to ensure the privacy of minors, doing everything possible to ensure that they have authorized the collection and use of the minor's personal data.
privacy.Through our website: Through our website you can access social networks. These are websites where the user can register and follow us for free. In these social networks, users will be able to learn about our activities, opinions, and access photos and videos. Users of these social networks must be aware that this place is independent of the website www.planilink.com and is open, that is, it is visible to all its users, and the privacy policies to apply to this content are those established for each social network. Planilink is not the owner of the social networks

Said consent will be subject to certain conditions. If you would like to create a link, frame or deep link to our Website please contact privacy@planilink.com.

You should review the Privacy Policy before using the Website and, as with these Terms of Use, the Privacy Policy may be modified by us at any time.

termsandcondition.These Terms of Use: These Terms of Use are not intended to grant rights to anyone except you and us.
termsandcondition.Planilink reserves: Planilink reserves the right to refuse any planning services without reason.
termsandcondition.Buyers pay Planilink: Buyers pay Planilink to create an order from the service page, using the Pay button. Planilink partners with payment service providers in order to collect all payments from buyers.
termsandcondition.You cannot pay using: You cannot pay using any method other than through the planilink.com site.
termsandcondition.If you have been asked: If you have been asked to use an alternative payment method, please inform Planilink immediately.
termsandcondition.By using the payment: By using the payment method proposed by Planilink you represent and warrant that: (a) you are legally authorized to provide such information; (b) you are legally authorized or permitted to make payments using the payment methods; (c) if you are an employee or agent of a company or person that owns the payment method, that company or person authorizes you to use the payment method to make payments on Planilink; and (d) such actions do not violate any applicable law.
termsandcondition.Planilink reserves the right to cancel: Planilink reserves the right to cancel or reject any transaction if fraudulent or unauthorized activity is detected.
termsandcondition.Planilink accepts: • Planilink accepts payments in euros and US dollars.
termsandcondition.The buyer will be able: • The buyer will be able to select the desired currency during the payment process.
termsandcondition.Payments will be made: • Payments will be made through the Stripe payment gateway.
termsandcondition.The total amount to pay: • The total amount to pay will be clearly indicated during the purchasing process.
termsandcondition.The planning charge will be: • The planning charge will be made before sending the case and before Planilink proceeds to plan the case requested by the buyer.
termsandcondition.Prices are subject: • Prices are subject to change without notice.
termsandcondition.Buyers are responsible: • Buyers are responsible for paying all direct or indirect taxes, including GST, VAT or income tax, that may apply based on your residence, location or otherwise, depending on the provisions of your jurisdiction. Buyers represent and warrant that they are and will at all times comply with their obligations under the income tax provisions of their jurisdiction. The price shown on the Planilink page includes all taxes and charges that may apply to buyers.
termsandcondition.If Planilink decides not to plan: • If Planilink decides not to plan the case for any reason, the amount paid by the buyer will be fully refunded except for any fees or commissions applied by the payment processor Stripe or the bank for the transaction.
termsandcondition.To request a return,: • To request a return, the customer must contact our support team and provide the necessary information to verify the transaction.
termsandcondition.Return requests must include: • Return requests must include detailed information about the product, order number and reason for the return.
termsandcondition.The period granted to make: • The period granted to make the return is 30 days from the date of the request.
termsandcondition.Once case planning has been: • Once case planning has been carried out by Planilink, no refund can be made as the work has been carried out.
termsandcondition.The refund will be made: • The refund will be made using the same payment method used in the original purchase.
termsandcondition.The time required for the refund: • The time required for the refund to reflect in the customer's account may vary depending on the payment method and the policies of the corresponding bank or financial institution.
termsandcondition.By using our online payment: By using our online payment services, you agree to comply with these terms and conditions. Planilink reserves the right to modify or update these terms at any time without prior notice. It is the customer's responsibility to periodically review these terms to be aware of any changes. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us through our support channels.
termsandcondition.Any dispute related to these Terms: Any dispute related to these Terms will be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the USA. Each paragraph of these Terms of Use operates separately. This means that if any court or local authority decides that any of them are illegal or unenforceable, the remaining paragraphs will remain in full force and effect.
termsandcondition.If you believe that any of your: If you believe that any of your copyrights (or other intellectual property rights) have been infringed on the Website or that there is any content that you believe is illegal or infringes your rights or those of a third party, please contact us at privacy@planilink.com.
termsandcondition.If you have any other questions: If you have any other questions or complaints regarding these Terms of Use or the Website, please contact us at privacy@planilink.com or write to us at Nebula Nexus LLC, 8206 Louisiana Blvd NE Ste B, #10080, Albuquerque, NM 87113.
termsandcondition.Copyright: Copyright © Nebula Nexus LLC All rights reserved. Planilink and the Planilink logo are trademarks or registered trademarks of Nebula Nexus LLC.

legalWriting.Planilink responsible for: Planilink responsible for the website, hereinafter RESPONSIBLE, makes this document available to users, with which it intends to comply with the obligations set forth in Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Information Society Services. and Electronic Commerce (LSSICE), BOE No. 166, as well as informing all users of the website regarding the conditions of use.
legalWriting.Any person who: Any person who accesses this website assumes the role of user, committing to strict observance and compliance with the provisions set forth herein, as well as any other legal provision that may be applicable.
legalWriting.Planilink reserves the right: Planilink reserves the right to modify any type of information that may appear on the website, without any obligation to notify or inform users of said obligations, with publication on the Planilink website being understood as sufficient.
legalWriting.including but not limited: The website, including but not limited to its programming, editing, compilation and other elements necessary for its operation, the designs, logos, text and/or graphics, are the property of the CONTROLLER or, if applicable, has express license or authorization from the authors. All contents of the website are duly protected by intellectual and industrial property regulations, as well as registered in the corresponding public registries. Regardless of the purpose for which they were intended, total or partial reproduction, use, exploitation, distribution and marketing, requires in all cases prior written authorization from the CONTROLLER. Any use not previously authorized is considered a serious breach of the author's intellectual or industrial property rights.
legalWriting.graphics other than: The designs, logos, text and/or graphics other than the CONTROLLER and that may appear on the website belong to their respective owners, who are themselves responsible for any possible controversy that may arise regarding them. The CONTROLLER expressly authorizes third parties to redirect directly to the specific contents of the website, and in any case redirect to the main website of Planilink.com To make any type of observation regarding possible breaches of intellectual or industrial property rights, as well as any of the contents of the website, you can do so by emailing
legalWriting.he CONTROLLER is exempt: The CONTROLLER is exempt from any type of responsibility derived from the information published on its website whenever this information has been manipulated or introduced by a third party unrelated to it.
legalWriting.This website may use: This website may use technical cookies (small information files that the server sends to the computer of the person accessing the page) to carry out certain functions that are considered essential for the correct functioning and display of the site. The cookies used are, in any case, temporary in nature, with the sole purpose of making navigation more efficient, and disappear when the user's session ends. In no case do these cookies provide personal data by themselves and will not be used to collect them.
legalWriting.Through the use of cookies: Through the use of cookies, it is also possible for the server where the website is located to recognize the browser used by the user in order to make navigation easier, allowing, for example, access by users who have previously registered to the areas, services, promotions or contests reserved exclusively for them without having to register for each visit. They can also be used to measure the audience, traffic parameters, control the progress and number of entries, etc., in these cases cookies being technically dispensable, but beneficial for the user. This website will not install dispensable cookies without the user's prior consent.
legalWriting.The user has the: The user has the possibility of configuring their browser to be alerted when cookies are received and to prevent their installation on their computer. Please consult your browser's instructions for more information.
legalWriting.From the website: From the website, you may be redirected to content on third-party websites. Given that the CONTROLLER cannot always control the contents introduced by third parties on their respective websites, it does not assume any type of responsibility regarding said contents. In any case, it will proceed to the immediate withdrawal of any content that could contravene national or international legislation, morality or public order, proceeding to the immediate withdrawal of the redirection to said website, bringing the content to the attention of the competent authorities. in question.
legalWriting.The CONTROLLER is not: The CONTROLLER is not responsible for the information and content stored, by way of example, but not limited to, in forums, chats, blog generators, comments, social networks or any other means that allows third parties to publish content independently on the page. website of the CONTROLLER. However, and in compliance with the provisions of articles 11 and 16 of the LSSICE, it is made available to all users, authorities and security forces, actively collaborating in the withdrawal or, where appropriate, blocking of all those contents that may affect or contravene national or international legislation, the rights of third parties or morality and public order. If the user considers that there is any content on the website that could be susceptible to this classification, please notify the website administrator immediately. This website has been reviewed and tested to function properly. In principle, correct operation can be guaranteed 365 days a year, 24 hours a day. However, the CONTROLLER does not rule out the possibility that there may be certain programming errors, or that force majeure, natural disasters, strikes or similar circumstances may occur that make access to the website impossible.
legalWriting.The website servers may: The website servers may automatically detect the IP address and domain name used by the user. An IP address is a number automatically assigned to a computer when it connects to the Internet. All this information is recorded in a server activity file that allows the subsequent processing of the data in order to obtain only statistical measurements that allow knowing the number of page impressions, the number of visits made to the web servers, the order of visits, the access point, etc.
legalWriting.For the resolution: For the resolution of all disputes or issues related to this website or the activities carried out on it, Spanish legislation will apply, to which the parties expressly submit, being competent for the resolution of all conflicts arising or related to its use the Courts and Tribunals closest to Madrid.

cookies.Due to the entry: Due to the entry into force of the relevant modification of the 'Information Society Services Law' (LSSICE) established by Royal Decree 13/2012, it is mandatory to obtain the express consent of the user of all web pages that They use dispensable cookies before you browse through them
cookies.This cookie policy: This Cookie Policy explains what cookies are and how we use them on our website. You should read this policy to understand what types of cookies we use, the information we collect through the use of cookies, and how that information is used.
cookies.Cookies and other similar: Cookies and other similar technologies, such as local shared objects, flash cookies or pixels, are tools used by Web servers to store and retrieve information about their visitors, as well as to ensure the correct functioning of the site. Through the use of these devices, the Web server is allowed to remember some data concerning the user, such as their preferences for viewing the pages of that server, name and password, products that interest them most, etc.
cookies.Cookies are small text: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work properly and to provide a better user experience, as well as to collect information about your browsing habits and preferences.
cookies.We use cookies for: We use cookies for several reasons, which are detailed below:
cookies.These cookies are necessary: These cookies are necessary for the basic functioning of our website. They include, for example, cookies that enable you to log into secure areas of our site.
cookies.These cookies allow us: These cookies allow us to recognize you and count visits on our website, as well as see how visitors navigate the site. This helps us improve the performance of our site, for example, by ensuring that users easily find what they are looking for.
cookies.These cookies are used: These cookies are used to recognize you when you return to our website and enable us to personalize our content for you, greeting you by name and remembering your preferences, such as your language or region.
cookies.These cookies record: These cookies record your visit to our website, the pages you have visited, and the links you have followed. We will use this information to make our website and the advertising displayed on it more relevant to your interests. We may also share this information with third parties for this purpose.
cookies.You can control: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your computer, and you can set most browsers to prevent them from being placed. However, if you do this, you may have to manually adjust some preferences each time you visit a site, and some features and services may not work.
cookies.Any changes we may: Any changes we may make to our cookie policy will be posted on this page and, where appropriate, notified to you by email. Be sure to check this policy periodically to stay informed of any changes or updates.
cookies.COOKIES AFFECTED: COOKIES AFFECTED BY THE REGULATIONS AND EXCEPTED COOKIES
cookies.According to the EU: According to the EU directive, the cookies that require informed consent from the user are analytical cookies and advertising and affiliation cookies, with the exception of those of a technical nature and those necessary for the operation of the website or the provision of services. expressly requested by the user.
cookies.Technical and functional cookies: Technical and functional cookies: these are those that allow the user to navigate through a website, platform or application and use the different options or services that exist therein.
cookies.Analytical cookies: Analytical cookies: these are those that allow the person responsible for them to monitor and analyze the behavior of the users of the websites to which they are linked. The information collected through this type of cookies is used to measure the activity of the websites, applications or platforms and to prepare navigation profiles of the users of said sites, applications and platforms, in order to introduce improvements in based on the analysis of usage data made by users of the service.
cookies.Advertising cookies: Advertising cookies: these are those that allow the management, in the most efficient way possible, of the advertising spaces that, where appropriate, the editor has included in a web page, application or platform from which the requested service is provided based on criteria. such as edited content or the frequency at which ads are shown.
cookies.Behavioral advertising cookies: Behavioral advertising cookies: they collect information about the user's personal preferences and choices (retargeting) to allow the management, in the most efficient way possible, of the advertising spaces that, where appropriate, the editor has included on a website, application or platform from which the requested service is provided.
cookies.Social Cookies: Social Cookies: These are set by social media platforms on the Services to allow you to share content with your friends and networks. Social media platforms have the ability to track your online activity outside of the Services. This may affect the content and messages you see on other services you visit
cookies.Affiliate cookies: Affiliate cookies: allow you to track visits from other websites, with which the website establishes an affiliation contract (affiliate companies).
cookies.Security cookies: Security cookies: they store encrypted information to prevent the data stored in them from being vulnerable to malicious attacks from third parties.
cookies.Own cookies: Own cookies: these are those that are sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain managed by the editor itself and from which the service requested by the user is provided.
cookies.Third-party cookies: Third-party cookies: are those that are sent to the user's terminal equipment from a computer or domain that is not managed by the editor, but by another entity that processes the data obtained through cookies.
cookies.Session cookies: Session cookies: are a type of cookies designed to collect and store data while the user accesses a web page.
cookies.Persistent cookies: Persistent cookies: are a type of cookie in which the data continues to be stored in the terminal and can be accessed and processed for a period defined by the person responsible for the cookie, which can range from a few minutes to several years.
cookies.From this panel: From this panel you can configure the cookies that the website can install in your browser, except for technical or functional cookies that are necessary for navigation and the use of the different options or services offered.
cookies.The selected cookies: The selected cookies indicate that the user authorizes the installation in their browser and the processing of data under the conditions reflected in the Cookies Policy.
cookies.The user can: The user can check or uncheck the selector depending on whether they wish to accept or reject the installation of cookies.
cookies.Third party services: Third party services are beyond the control of the publisher. Suppliers can modify their conditions of service, purpose and use of cookies, etc. at any time.
cookies.External providers: External providers of this website: No cookies controlled by third parties are installed.
cookies.HOW TO MANAGE COOKIES FROM THE BROWSER: HOW TO MANAGE COOKIES FROM THE BROWSER
cookies.Delete Cookies from Device: Delete Cookies from Device – Cookies already on a device can be deleted by clearing the browser history, thereby deleting cookies from all websites visited. However, some saved information (for example, login data or website preferences) may also be lost.
cookies.Manage site-specific: Manage site-specific cookies: For finer control over site-specific cookies, users can adjust their privacy and cookie settings in the browser. Block Cookies – While most modern browsers can be configured to prevent cookies from being placed on devices, this may require manual adjustment of certain preferences each time a site or page is visited. Additionally, some services and features may not work correctly (for example, profile logins).

advantage.New horizons on the invisible level: New horizons on the invisible level
advantage.It is time to get: It is time to get rid of conditions, labels, rates and limits. No more professional categorizations for the public eye by purchase volume, no start-up nor certification costs... Just pay for each Orthodontic planning service.
advantage.Making your aligners: Making your aligners opens new horizons for you.
advantage.Provide patients with: Provide patients with their aligners in less than 24 hours after case approval.
advantage.Replace the aligners due: Replace the aligners due to loss or breakage on the same day without stopping the treatment.
advantage.Forget about waiting: Forget about waiting 1 or 2 weeks for the treatment or replacements to arrive.
advantage.Quickly response to: Quickly response to any change in treatment goals.
advantage.You set the degrees of immersion: You set the degrees of immersion
advantage.You can use this system: You can use this system for simple cases, recurrences, touch-ups, first or last phases or for all types of malocclusions, no matter how complex they may be. In any case, you decide and we support you by planning plastic orthodontics.
advantage.Do not give bad news: Do not give bad news to your patients
advantage.Decide the profitability: Decide the profitability of each case and enlarge the range of patients treated. Adjusting the budget in some specific cases will increase the profit rather than hiring the service or fabrication to a brand. Furthermore, not only profitability matters. Offering treatment possibilities to patients who are not able to afford them makes us greater.
advantage.The next trendy aligner: The next trendy aligner brand is going to be yours
advantage.Visualize the design: Visualize the design of your brand image, its colors, the packaging, the details and carry it out. Nowadays, it is really simple.
advantage.Shall we tell you a secret?: Shall we tell you a secret?
advantage.There is no need to print: There is no need to print and thermoform large number of aligners. Supply your patients with aligners in sets of 3 or 4 stages. Remember that the aligners have to changed every 11 to 15 days. You have a large timeframe to be able to manufacture the aligners of the following stages. You will save time and money.
advantage.Is that all: Is that all? No, there is still more
advantage.Learning how to handle: Learning how to handle 3D printing with aligners will expand your access to the “in office” manufacturing of dentures, provisional, surgical guides… in short, to the manufacturing of all products in any dental branch.
